name: TheScreamer VR
description: Sit back and Buckle up and get ready to ride The Screamer,
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 300 MB available space
